about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I am a software engineer with knowledge in multiple technologies from Lima, Per√∫. I am very passionate about programming and always eager to improve and learn more. I am currently seeking a software developer job where I can grow professionally.

spotifyPlaylistManagement.title: Spotify Playlist Management
spotifyPlaylistManagement.description: A web application for managing Spotify playlists with Angular 17 and Spotify API integration. Features include playlist creation, deletion, and song management.

taskListApp.title: Task List Application
taskListApp.description: A task management application built with Angular 15 and Spring Boot. It allows users to create, edit, and delete tasks, with a focus on user-friendly design.

warehouseManagement.title: Warehouse Management System
warehouseManagement.description: A warehouse management system developed with Angular 17 and Spring Boot. It provides functionalities for order management, managing products, and stock tracking.
